articles.author: GERALD IMRAY, NQOBILE NTSHANGASE
articles.title: Girl, 8, only survivor of bus crash that kills 45 Easter pilgrims on South Africa's deadly roads - The Associated Press
articles.description: An 8-year-old girl was the lone survivor after a bus full of Easter pilgrims from Botswana making their way to a popular church festival in rural South Africa crashed off a bridge on a mountain pass and plunged into a ravine before bursting into flames. Autho…
articles.content: MMAMATLAKALA, South Africa (AP) An 8-year-old girl was the lone survivor after a bus full of pilgrims making their way to a popular Easter festival in rural South Africa slammed into a bridge on a mo… [+4429 chars]

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: At least 45 people killed and one survivor after South Africa’s bus crash - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: An eight-year-old girl survived and was airlifted to hospital to receive medical treatment.
articles.content:
A bus has plunged off a bridge into a ravine in South Africa, killing 45 of the 46 passengers on board, according to the Department of Transport.
The only survivor, an eight-year-old girl, was airli… [+2645 chars]
